title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: There is too much spacing between the button and the list. The top button is not aligned with the top of the dialog. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview does not wrap. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The spacing between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label to accommodate a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview should wrap and have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Navigate to the first page.
3. Observe the spacing between the button and the list.
4. Observe the alignment of the top button.
5. Observe the lack of a label for the table.
6. Try to select multiple items in the table.
7. Observe the signature preview text.
8. Hover over the signature preview and observe the background color.
